title: Paul Onteri's Blog
author: Paul Onteri
description: Random thoughts and musings from Paul Onteri

postsList.title: Introducing Tailwind Nexjs Starter Blog
postsList.summary: Looking for a performant, out of the box template, with all the best in web technology to support your blogging needs? Checkout the Tailwind Nextjs Starter Blog template.

postsList.title: Images in Next.js
postsList.summary: In this article we introduce adding images in the tailwind starter blog and the benefits and limitations of the next/image component.

postsList.title: Deriving the OLS Estimator
postsList.summary: How to derive the OLS Estimator with matrix notation and a tour of math typesetting using markdown with the help of KaTeX.

postsList.title: Markdown Guide
postsList.summary: Markdown cheatsheet for all your blogging needs - headers, lists, images, tables and more! An illustrated guide based on Github Flavored Markdown.

postsList.title: The Time Machine
postsList.summary: The Time Traveller (for so it will be convenient to speak of him) was expounding a recondite matter to us. His pale grey eyes shone and twinkled, and his usually pale face was flushed and animated...

postsList.title: O Canada
postsList.summary: The scenic lands of Canada featuring maple leaves, snow-capped mountains, turquoise lakes and Toronto. Take in the sights in this photo gallery exhibition and see how easy it is to replicate with some MDX magic and tailwind classes.

postsList.title: Sample .md file
postsList.summary: Example of a markdown file with code blocks and syntax highlighting
